Posts.Content: I also debated about radiation. I went thru 7 weeks and while I hated every day of it, I never suffered severe burns, only minor skin irritation. I've spoken to several people who skipped rads and then had a recurrance. They all wondered if they had had the radition , would the recurrance have happened. I know it's a hard decision and my thoughts and prayers are with you!!
Posts.Title: Anyone opted out of Radiation

Posts.Content: I'm sorry to hear of your loss. Lost my MIL in October. You know they are keeping a watchful eye on you from heaven. Gail
Posts.Title: MIL Passed Away
